Keywords: Green Lantern Corps , Herald , New Guardians , Police , Sinestro Corps
Real Name: Hal Jordan and Thaal Sinestro
Special Powers
WERE WE EVER TRULY FRIENDS?: When Hal Jordan and Sinestro is KO'd by an attack, before removing them from the game, you may generate a character named Hal Jordan and/or a character named Sinestro from your Sideline on their last non-KO clicks, then heal them each 2 clicks. The total points of the generated characters must be equal to or less than Hal Jordan and Sinestro's point value. If Hal Jordan and Sinestro is 75 points, only generate one of the two characters instead. Protected: Pulse Wave.
DO I CONSTANTLY HAVE TO WATCH OVER YOU?: Willpower. // When an opposing character would use Outwit, Perplex, or Probability Control to target Hal Jordan and Sinestro or an adjacent friendly character, roll a d6. 3-6: The use of that power has no effect.
JUST TRY TO KEEP UP: Hypersonic Speed. When Hal Jordan and Sinestro uses it, after resolutions they may make an attack.
LIMITLESS IMAGINATION: Hal Jordan and Sinestro can use the displayed standard attack and displayed standard damage powers of adjacent characters.
